Package me.agno.gridjavacore.annotations

Annotation Interface GridColumn

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(FIELD) public @interface GridColumn
Specifies that a field represents a column in a grid. This annotation can be used to customize the behavior and appearance of the column.

  • Required Element Summary

    Required Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Required Element
    Description
    Class<?>
    type
    Returns the class type of the annotated column.

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    boolean
    filterEnabled
    Retrieves the value indicating whether filtering is enabled for the column.
    boolean
    hidden
    Returns a boolean value indicating whether the field should be hidden in a grid.
    boolean
    key
    Returns a boolean value indicating whether the field represents a key.
    int
    position
    Returns the position of the column in a grid.
    boolean
    sortEnabled
    Indicates whether sorting is enabled for the column.
    GridSortDirection
    sortInitialDirection
    Returns the initial sorting direction for a grid column.

  • Element Details

    • type

      Class<?> type
      Returns the class type of the annotated column.
      Returns:
      the type of the annotated column

    • key

      boolean key
      Returns a boolean value indicating whether the field represents a key. This method is used to retrieve the value of the key attribute in the GridColumn annotation. If the key attribute is set to true, it indicates that the field represents a primary key column in a grid. Returns false if the key attribute is not set or if the annotation is not present.
      Returns:
      a boolean value indicating whether the field represents a key
      Default:
      false

    • hidden

      boolean hidden
      Returns a boolean value indicating whether the field should be hidden in a grid. This method is used to retrieve the value of the hidden attribute in the GridColumn annotation. If the hidden attribute is set to true, it indicates that the field should be hidden in a grid. Returns false if the hidden attribute is not set or if the annotation is not present.
      Returns:
      a boolean value indicating whether the field should be hidden in a grid
      Default:
      false

    • position

      int position
      Returns the position of the column in a grid. This method is used to retrieve the value of the position attribute in the GridColumn annotation. The position value determines the order of the column in the grid.
      Returns:
      the position of the column in a grid.
      Default:
      2147483647

    • sortEnabled

      boolean sortEnabled
      Indicates whether sorting is enabled for the column.
      Returns:
      true if sorting is enabled for the column, false otherwise
      Default:
      false

    • filterEnabled

      boolean filterEnabled
      Retrieves the value indicating whether filtering is enabled for the column.
      Returns:
      true if filtering is enabled for the column, false otherwise
      Default:
      false

    • sortInitialDirection

      GridSortDirection sortInitialDirection
      Returns the initial sorting direction for a grid column.
      Returns:
      the initial sorting direction for a grid column
      Default:
      ASCENDING
